select t.task_no , t.task_title , t.id , to_char(t.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "start_date" , to_char(t.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "end_date" , subject_no from task t where subject_no = #{subject} and status = 'N' order by t.task_no desc
select task_no , student_id , submit_content , submit_date , modify_date , status from task_submit where student_id = #{id}

select t.task_no as "task_no" , t.task_title as "task_title" , id , to_char(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "start_date" , to_char(end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "end_date" , t.task_content as "task_content" , ts.status as "status" , ts.submit_content as "submit_content" , origin_name , change_name , end_date from task t left join task_file tf on (t.task_no = tf.task_no) left join task_submit ts on (t.task_no = ts.task_no) where t.task_no = #{taskNo} and (student_id is NULL or student_id = #{studentId}) order by t.task_no

SELECT ts.task_no as "task_no" , t.task_title as "task_title" , ts.student_id as "student_id" , to_char(ts.submit_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "submit_date" , ts.submit_content as "submit_content" , t.task_content as "task_content" FROM task t INNER JOIN task_submit ts ON t.task_no = ts.task_no WHERE ts.task_no = #{taskNo} and ts.student_id = #{studentId} and ts.status = 'N'
